name: purescript-isomorphic-react-example
description: Isomorphic React App Example in Purescript

scripts.buildComment: echo 'client build builds inside `.build/Jam.App/`, so that we can use relative imports in both client and server.'
scripts.build: mkdirp 'dist/static'; mkdirp '.build/Jam.App'; pulp build -m Jam.App -t .build/Jam.App/index.js; browserify -p [css-modulesify -o dist/static/style.css --after 'postcss-import' --after postcss-url --after postcss-assets --after postcss-cssnext --after postcss-nested --after postcss-custom-media --after postcss-will-change --after postcss-custom-media ] -o dist/static/index.js .build/Jam.App/index.js
scripts.watch: mkdirp 'dist/static'; mkdirp '.build/Jam.App'; pulp -w build -m Jam.App -t .build/Jam.App/index.js& watchify -p [css-modulesify -o dist/static/style.css --after 'postcss-import' --after postcss-url --after postcss-assets --after postcss-cssnext --after postcss-nested --after postcss-custom-media --after postcss-will-change --after postcss-custom-media ] -o dist/static/index.js .build/Jam.App/index.js

author: Marcin Szamotulski
